name: PROJECT HERO - Mutants Evolve
description:
You're not mutation, you are evolution. - Keith R. A. DeCandido

[PROJECT HERO - MUTANTS EVOLVE]

You wake up with no memory in an unfamiliar building. It's a lab. You've been experimented on. With your new-found powers, you must uncover secrets about your past but also save the present.

There is an evil corporate company named BioTech. They are a pharmaceutical company on the outside, but on the inside, they commit experimental torture to force victims into mutating.

Can you mutate a mutation?

Have you ever wanted to roleplay a mutants journey? Now you can.

[Development]

PROJECT HERO - Mutants Evolve is based on a new character in the Project Hero Comic Universe. It is a University assignment for my games design course. The assignment brief was to make an interactive story.

[Contact]

Sequel?

If this game gets reviews and feedback I will begin Mutants Evolve II.

Bugs?

Please report all bugs via email on the contact section.
